data.text: @ears2you @YIMBY_Princeton @NewsFallon @NJDeptofHealth It is people still living in fear of Covid without cause that are in a perpetual state of feeling threatened. I am not threatened by choice, but protecting the developmental needs of children is a hill I will die on. If u think the 😷 kids wear for 🏀 are saving lives, u do u.

@SabrinaJoyDC @YIMBY_Princeton @NewsFallon @NJDeptofHealth The actions of a few affect many. I agree that sports has not been careful enough. My kids wore masks while playing basketball thank you very much. I’m thankful our school has the choice and I have not kids complaining about having to wear a mask. Sorry you feel threatened.

@ears2you @YIMBY_Princeton @NewsFallon @NJDeptofHealth Read up on the harm happening due both to CDC and DOH and the apathy of BOEs who were not on the right side of history in their advocacy. It is over Gregg. Move on with your life. SOTU was shameful - our kids can fully move on now. https://t.co/V5ezYoKETG

@ears2you @YIMBY_Princeton @NewsFallon @NJDeptofHealth I haven’t got the time today for people who think BOEs can be trusted to make the right decisions for kids. One size does not fit all for children. NJDOH has completely disregarded needs & is political themselves. Murphy/DOH allow 😷 exceptions for sports, but not special needs. https://t.co/sY19zyQUim
@SabrinaJoyDC @YIMBY_Princeton @NewsFallon @NJDeptofHealth Because the CDC makes quasi-political decisions and local school boards make decisions that are best for the students.

@SabrinaJoyDC @NewsFallon @NJDeptofHealth Why are people so afraid of extra caution?

Are the same people constantly questioning why buildings are over-engineered?
@MattFriedmanNJ @NewsFallon @NJDeptofHealth Someone get InfoWars on the phone
@NewsFallon @NJDeptofHealth Clearly a massive conspiracy is in the works
@NewsFallon @NJDeptofHealth The vax results came out lol, not good for the sheeple who took it. Terrible
